title: Interactive conversational exploration for /explore slash command
description:
Transform /explore into an interactive, conversational experience where AI asks clarifying questions to deeply understand features before documenting.

Implementation Approach:
- Template-only enhancement (no CLI changes)
- Update .claude/commands/explore.md with conversation instructions
- Required steps: conversation flow, context loading, preview approval
- Flexible guidance: question depth adapts to feature complexity

Decisions Implemented:
1. Mix of required steps and flexible guidance for template structure
2. Define required coverage areas (what/why/gotchas/tests)
3. Summary with key sections highlighted for preview
4. Scoped to /explore only (not /build, /decide, /ship)
5. Store conversation in exploration.md as synthesized prose
6. User can provide direction or request restart for error handling
